pages.title: Two-handing

pages.text: However some large weapons, particularly those from mods might be considered two-handed.$(br)Two-handed weapons $(thing)$(l:footwork:selfdefense/binding)bind$() your offhand when wielded; they are typically large weapons with large sweeps and heavy posture damage.$(br2)Most weapons also come with a "two-handing bonus", which is engaged when a weapon is wielded without an active shield in your offhand. $(o)(of course, this means two-handed weapons will almost always benefit from this)$()

A weapon can have its twohanded bonuses checked by holding ALT while browsing a weapon's tooltips. It varies between different types and sizes of weapons, but generally confers a sizeable helping of useful attributes. $(br2)Most similar weapons of a class type $(o)(hammers, axes, katanas, spears, etc.)$() will share the same two-handing bonus.
